title: Crystal River Chiropractor, Lecanto and Citrus County FL - Neck and Back Care Center
author: -Joanne H
description: Chiropractor, Crystal River FL | Neck and Back Care Center. We're here to help Lecanto and Citrus County residents whether you're interested in short-term back pain relief or long-term wellness care. (352) 563-5055
cleaned_text: Crystal River Chiropractor | Neck and Back Care Center Chiropractic Works What you'll find is what so many other Crystal River-area residents have discovered: Chiropractic is amazingly simple. Chiropractic is remarkably safe, and chiropractors can be helpful for a variety of health problems—problems that rarely resolve on their own. Waiting will only postpone the moment you enjoy relief. Auto Accident? We Can Help... Have you been in an auto accident? [Click here](http://www.yourinjurydoc.com/) to learn more about how chiropractic can help you. Please explore our information-rich chiropractic site so you fully understand what chiropractic is, what chiropractors do and what you can expect in our office. When you're ready, call [Neck and Back Care Center](/contact-us/) who helps Crystal River residents whether they want relief or wellness. Find out for yourself why so many of your neighbors already have.
